"Subdue Fang Banther":
"A large native creature known as a Fang
Banther has been rampaging through the
backwoods of Naberius.
Darker influence is suspected to be the
root of its newfound hostility.
All personnel should go to the forest and
subdue the Fang Banther.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area."
